statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{6 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x - 4 , -6 \, x - 1 , -x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + x + 4 , 3 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} + 15 \, x - 9 , -4 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
